card.name: Adrian Conrad
card.property: When you play Adrian Conrad, you may block a character from the current mission. Each time you revive Adrian Conrad at a failed mission, you may take him into your hand.

card.name: Amonet
card.property: Each time you assign Amoney, your opponent may incapacitate a team character. If they don't, you may stop a character.

card.name: Apophis
card.property: When you score Apophis, your opponent may destroy two support characters. If they don't, you may incapacitate a team character.

card.name: Baal
card.property: When you score Baal, incapacitate a stopped team character.

card.name: Borren
card.property: Failure: Stop a character.

card.name: Camulus
card.property: Complications get difficulty +1 while Camulus is assigned.

card.name: Cronus
card.property: Each time you would pay Cronus' revive cost, you may destroy another adversary instead. If you do, revive and ready Cronus.

card.name: Erebus Commander
card.property: Erebus Commander gets difficulty +1 for each obstacle that has dominion.

card.name: Herak
card.property: Each time you assign Herak, you may destroy an assigned support character.

card.name: The Keeper
card.property: Failure: Look at the top five cards of your opponent's deck. You may place them in any order on the top and/or bottom of that deck.

card.name: Kendrick
card.property: At the end of your opponent's power phase, you may destroy Kendrick. If you do, your opponent shuffles their mission pile.

card.name: Khalek
card.property: Each time you assign Khalek, place a random card from your opponent's hand face up beneath him. For each hero card beneath Khalek, he gets difficulty +1 and revive cost +1.

card.name: Kull Warrior
card.property: Each time Kull Warrior would be destroyed, you may pay its revive cost to prevent that.

card.name: Nerus
card.property: Each time your opponent is about to play a mission, you may stop Nerus and pay 3 power. If you do, look at the top card of your opponent's mission pile, then place it on the top or bottom of that pile.

card.name: Olokun
card.property: Each time you assign Olokun, you may choose a team character and pay power equal to the number of glyphs they have. If you do, they are blocked from the current mission.

card.name: Osiris
card.property: When you play Osiris, stop a support character. Each time you revive Osiris, your opponent stops a support character.

card.name: Peter Tanner
card.property: Each time you assign Peter Tanner, you may pay power equal to a support character's highest skill. If you do, stop that character.

card.name: Ra
card.property: Each time you assign Ra, you may discard any number of cards. If you do, draw the same number of cards.

card.name: Raphael
card.property: Failure: Destroy a support character. If another Political card is at the current mission, you may incapacitate a team character instead.

card.name: Reese
card.property: Each time you assign Reese, you may reveal the top two cards of your deck. If you do, you may play one Replicator card revealed this way at no cost, then discard the other cards.

card.name: Robert Kinsey
card.property: At the end of your power phase, if this adversary card is in your villain store pile, you gain 1 power.

card.name: Sekhmet
card.property: Sekhmet costs power -2 to play while no characters are assigned. To assign Sekhmet, pay 1 power for each assigned character.

card.name: Sindar
card.property: While this adversary card is in your villain score pile, each of your opponent's missions gets: "Failure: Your opponent may take a Jaffa adversary or Jaffa obstacle card from their discard pile into hand."

card.name: Third
card.property: Third gets revive cost -1 for each other replicator card at the current mission.

card.name: Thoth
card.property: Failure: You may take an adversary card from your discard pile into hand.

card.name: Til'Vak
card.property: Each time you assign Til'Vak, you may choose a support character. They are blocked from the current mission. Failure: Destroy the chosen support character.

card.name: Yu
card.property: Pay 1 power - Yu gets revive cost -2 until the end of the current mission.

card.name: Zipacna
card.property: Stop Zipacna, pay 3 power - Choose a Goa'uld obstacle to get dominion. (When you score an adversary, you may also score one obstacle with dominion.)

card.name: Adal
card.property: Destroy Adal - Ready an incapacitated Jaffa character. Destroy Adal - Stop an incapacitated character (he is no longer incapacitated).

card.name: Aegir
card.property: When you play Aegir, if an adversary is assigned, the current mission gets difficulty -1.

card.name: Alar
card.property: Alar gets skills -1 for each different trait (other than "character," "team," and "support") on all assigned characters.

card.name: Alec Colson
card.property: Alec Colson is blocked during the first mission played each turn.

card.name: Anatole Konstantinov
card.property: At the start of your debrief phase, you may look at one card from the top of your mission pile for each failed mission. If you do, place those cards in any order on the top or bottom of that pile.

card.name: Anise
card.property: While Anise is ready, she gets: "Stop a team character - The current mission gets difficulty -1."

card.name: Ayiana
card.property: Stop Ayiana, pay 3 power - Ready another character. Destroy Ayiana - Ready another character.

card.name: Boris
card.property: While Boris is assigned, he gets Culture +1 for each assigned Russian character who has a glyph.

card.name: Brent Langham
card.property: When you play Brent Langham, you may stop an NID team character. If you do, search your deck for a gear card, reveal it, take it into hand, and shuffle your deck. If you don't, you may take a gear card from your discard pile into hand.

card.name: Brian Vogler
card.property: Destroy Brian Vogler - Destroy a support character. During your opponent's turn, Brian Vogler becomes an adversary that can't be assigned, revived, or scored.

card.name: Bricksdale
card.property: Stop Bricksdale - Ready a gear.

card.name: Carmichael
card.property: Each time another character would be incapacitated, you may stop Carmichael and pay 2 power. If you do, stop that character instead.

card.name: Carolyn Lam
card.property: Each time a Science obstacle is played, you may pay 2 power. If you do, Carolyn Lam gets skills +1 until the end of the current mission.

card.name: Charlie
card.property: Success: Look at the top five cards of your deck. You may place them in any order on the top and/or bottom of that deck.

card.name: Chaska
card.property: Failure: Each team character gets skills +1 until the end of the turn.

card.name: Chloe
card.property: Choose a team character, discard a card - Until the end of the turn, that team character gets Culture +1 and Science +1. You can do this only once each turn.

card.name: Daniel Jackson
card.property: When you play Daniel Jackson, each assigned team character gets skills +1 until the end of the current mission.

card.name: Delek
card.property: Stop Delek - Gain 1 power.

card.name: Denya
card.property: When you play Denya, your opponent loses 1 power.

card.name: Garan
card.property: Garan gets Culture +2 if there was a failed mission this turn. Garan gets Ingenuity +2 if there was a successful mission this turn.

card.name: Golon Jarlath
card.property: Failure: Each team character gets skills +1 until the end of the turn.

card.name: Graham Simmons
card.property: Graham Simmons costs power -1 to play for each ready gear.

card.name: Jack O'Neill
card.property: Each time an SGC character earns a glyph, if Jack O'Neill is ready, you may stop him. If you do, the next mission this turn gets difficulty -2.

card.name: Jarrod Kane
card.property: While an adversary is assigned, Jarrod Kane gets Science +1 and Combat +1.

card.name: Ka'lel
card.property: Ka'lel gets Culture +1 if there was a successful Combat mission this turn. Ka'lel gets Combat +1 if there was a successful Culture mission this turn.

card.name: Kasuf
card.property: Success: Destroy an adversary.

card.name: Kearney
card.property: When you play Kearney, you may pay 2 power. If you do, ready a gear.

card.name: Kheb Monk
card.property: Destroy Kheb Monk, pay 2 power - Unblock a character.

card.name: Luthor
card.property: When you play Luthor, unblock a character.

card.name: Marell
card.property: Each time you assign Marell, you may destroy an obstacle. If you do, destroy Marell at the end of the current mission.

card.name: Maz'rai
card.property: Destroy Maz'rai - Gain 1 power (or 2 power if at least one Jaffa character is assigned).

card.name: Mr. Kent
card.property: Mr. Kent gets Combat +1 for each NID character who has a glyph.

card.name: Natania
card.property: Natania gets Culture +1 if there was a successful mission this turn. Natania gets Combat +1 if there was a failed mission this turn.

card.name: Orlin
card.property: Each time Orlin becomes stopped, place the top card of your deck face down beneath him. Orlin gets skills -1 for each card beneath him.

card.name: Ruslan Chernovshev
card.property: Ruslan Chernovshev gets Science +1 while an NID character is assigned. Ruslan Chernovshev gets Ingenuity +1 while another Russian character is assigned.

card.name: Sanderson
card.property: Each time you play another NID card, Sanderson gets Combat +1 until end of turn. Each time you play a gear, Sanderson gets Ingenuity +1 until the end of the turn.

card.name: Seevis
card.property: Success: You may ready a team character.

card.name: Shau'nac
card.property: Destroy Shau'nac - Choose a team character to get skills +1 until the end of the turn.

card.name: Siler
card.property: Each time another support character would be stopped, you may stop Siler and ready that character instead.

card.name: Sina
card.property: Each time you place a Tok'ra event in your discard pile, you may stop Sina. If you do, take that event into hand.

card.name: Skaara
card.property: While Skaara is assigned, he gets: "Stop Skaara - Ready another character."

card.name: Steven Rayner
card.property: Steven Rayner costs power -2 to play while none of your characters has a glyph.

card.name: T'akaya
card.property: When you play a Combat mission, destroy T'akaya. Destroy T'akaya, pay X power - Place an adversary that costs X on the bottom of their owner's deck.

card.name: Tara'c
card.property: Stop and destroy Tara'c - Your opponent loses 1 power.

card.name: "Tyler"
card.property: Pay 1 power, discard a card - Choose another character. "Tyler" gets all that character's traits until the end of the current mission. (If he gets "team," he still assigns as a support character.)

card.name: Xe'ls
card.property: When you play a Combat mission, destroy Xe'ls. Each time a gear or another support character would be destroyed, you may stop Xe'ls instead.

card.name: Yat'Yir
card.property: If another Jaffa card has been played this turn, Yat'Yir gets skills +1. While a Jaffa adversary is assigned, Yat'Yir gets skills +1.

card.name: Young Jack
card.property: While an SCG team character is assigned, Young Jack gets Science +1, Combat +1, and Ingenuity +1. While Jack O'Neill is assigned, Young Jack gets Ingenuity +1.

card.name: Yuri
card.property: Each time an obstacle is played while Yuri is assigned with another Russian character, you may destroy him. If you do, destroy that obstacle.

card.name: Zarin
card.property: While Zarin is assigned, she gets: "Stop Zarin - Stop a ready adversary."

card.name: Alexi Vaselov
card.property: Orion: Each time your opponent assigns an adversary while Alexi Vaselov is assigned, you gain 1 power. Triangulum: Each time your opponent plays an obstacle while Alexi Vaselov is assigned, you gain 1 power.

card.name: Altman
card.property: Altman gets skills +1 while another SGC character has at least one glyph matching one of his.

card.name: Aron
card.property: Each adversary gets revive cost +1 for each different glyph Aron has.

card.name: Barber
card.property: Gemini, Discard a hero card, pay 1 power - Barber gets Culture +1 until the end of the current mission.

card.name: Cameron Mitchell
card.property: Each time you assign Cameron Mitchell, you may pay 3 power and discard a card. If you do, ready another character who has a glyph matching one of his.

card.name: Daniel Jackson
card.property: Each mission that has a glyph matching one of Daniel Jackson's gets difficulty -1 while he is ready or assigned.

card.name: Daria Voronkova
card.property: Each time Daria Voronkova earns a glyph, you may ready another Russian character.

card.name: Elliot
card.property: While Elliot is assigned to a mission that has a glyph none of your characters has, he gets skills +1 for each different glyph he has.

card.name: Grogan
card.property: For each different glyph Grogan has, he gets skills +1 and point value -1.

card.name: Harper
card.property: Libra, Discard a hero card, pay 1 power - Harper gets Science +1 until the end of the current mission.

card.name: Jack O'Neill
card.property: Libra: Each other character who has a Libra glyph gets skills +1. Scorpius: Each other character who has a Scorpius glyph gets skills +1.

card.name: Jay Felger
card.property: Pay 1 power - Move a glyph from Jay Felger to another character.

card.name: Jennifer Hailey
card.property: Gemini or Scorpius: Each hero card's success text occurs an additional time while Jennifer Hailey is assigned. (Missions are hero cards.)

card.name: Jennings
card.property: Libra: Each time you assign Jennings, adversaries can't be revived until the end of the current mission. Success or Failure: If Jennings doesn't have a Pisces glyph, destroy all assigned support characters.

card.name: Kelmaa
card.property: Scorpius: Each time Kelmaa would become incapacitated, you may pay 2 power. If you do, stop her instead. Triangulum, Stop and incapacitate Kelmaa - Stop an incapacitated character (they are no longer incapacitated).

card.name: Kershaw
card.property: Each time you play a mission that has a glyph matching one of Kershaw's, your opponent loses 1 power.

card.name: Kvasir
card.property: Scorpius: Kvasir gets Culture +1. Gemini: Kvasir gets Ingenuity +1. Pisces: Kvasir gets Ingenuity +1.

card.name: Lindsay
card.property: Each time Lindsay earns a different glyph, you may pay 3 power and discard a card. If you do, ready her.

card.name: Mala
card.property: Each time Mala earns a Gemini glyph, you may search your deck for a Jaffa character card. If you do, reveal it, take it into hand, and shuffle your deck.

card.name: Mansfield
card.property: Libra or Pisces: Mansfield gets skills +1 for each successful mission this turn.

card.name: M'zel
card.property: Triangulum: Jaffa support characters cost power -1 to play. Gemini and Orion: Jaffa hero cards cost power -1 to play.

card.name: Narim
card.property: Pisces or Scorpius, Stop Narim - Unblock a character. Pisces and Scorpius, Block Narim from the current mission, pay 2 power - Unblock another character.

card.name: Ren'al
card.property: Each time Ren'al earns a glyph, you may take a Tok'ra card from your discard pile into hand.

card.name: Reynolds
card.property: Orion: Reynolds gets skills +1 for each other stopped SGC team character who has a glyph.

card.name: Samantha Carter
card.property: Pisces, Stop and incapacitate Samantha Carter - Turn an assigned adversary face down. (They become a complication.)

card.name: Samantha Carter
card.property: Gemini, Stop Samantha Carter, pay 2 power - Return an obstacle at the current mission to its owner's hand.

card.name: Shawn Grieves
card.property: Orion or Scorpius, Destroy a support character, pay 2 power - Ready an NID character.

card.name: Smith
card.property: Each time you play a gear, you may stop Smith. If you do, gain 1 power for each different glyph Smith has.

card.name: Teal'c
card.property: Pisces: Teal'c gets skills +1 while an adversary is assigned. Triangulum: Teal'c gets skills +1 while an adversary is assigned.

card.name: Tolinev
card.property: Tolinev gets experience +1 for each other Russian character who has a glyph matching one of hers.

card.name: Vala Mal Doran
card.property: Gemini, Pay 2 power, block another team character - Ready Vala Mal Doran.

card.name: Vallarin
card.property: Libra: Vallarin gets skills +1 for each failed mission.

card.name: Annihilation
card.property: To play this event, you must have an assigned character. Stop all assigned NID characters. Destroy all other assigned support characters, and all complications, obstacles, and assigned adversaries. Incapacitate all other assigned team characters.

card.name: Celebration
card.property: Choose a team character to get skills +1 until the end of the current mission. If there was a successful mission this turn, they get skills +2 until the end of the current mission instead.

card.name: Clever Disguise
card.property: You can play this event only if the current mission is an Ingenuity mission. Choose a team character to get skills +1 until the end of the current mission. If they are blocked, unblock them.

card.name: Digging Deep
card.property: Ready a character. At the end of the current mission, incapacitate them.

card.name: Entropic Cascade Failure
card.property: Reveal the top four cards of your deck. Play a revealed support card at no cost, then discard the other cards. At the end of the turn, destroy that character.

card.name: Finishing Blow
card.property: Destroy a stopped adversary.

card.name: Gone Fishing
card.property: Discard any number of hero cards. Then search your deck for a hero card with a cost equal to or less than the number of cards you discarded. Reveal it, take it into hand, and shuffle your deck.

card.name: Guest Lecture
card.property: You can play this event only if the current mission is an Culture mission. Choose a team character to get skills +1 until the end of the current mission. If they have no glyphs, you may move a glyph from another character to them.

card.name: Helping Hand
card.property: Destroy an obstacle that is neither Goa'uld or Jaffa. Then you may stop an Asgard character. If you do, gain 2 power.

card.name: Important Dig
card.property: Stop up to two characters who each have 2 Culture or more. For each character you stop, take a gear card from your discard pile into hand.

card.name: Interrogation
card.property: Stop up to two characters who each have 2 Ingenuity or more. For each character you stop, take a villain card from your discard pile into hand.

card.name: Intimidation
card.property: To play this event, choose an assigned NID team character and discard a support character card. Until the end of the current mission, that team character gains the skills of the discarded card.

card.name: Kelnorim
card.property: To play this event, block a ready Jaffa character from the current mission. That character gets skills +1 until the end of the turn.

card.name: Lay Down Cover
card.property: Stop up to two characters who each have 2 Combat or more. For each character you stop, stop an adversary.

card.name: Leave Behind No Trace
card.property: Take an event card from your discard pile into hand.

card.name: Lucy! I'm Home!
card.property: To play this event, block a ready team character from the current mission. Ready an SGC character.

card.name: Martial Arts Training
card.property: You can play this event only if the current mission is a Combat mission. Choose a character to get skills +1 until the end of the current mission. If they have no glyphs, you may move a glyph from another character to them.

card.name: New Tack
card.property: You can play this event only if the current mission is a Culture mission. Choose a character to get skills +1 until the end of the current mission. If they are blocked, unblock them.

card.name: Perks
card.property: Take a hero card from your discard pile into hand.

card.name: Plan B
card.property: Gain 2 power for each failed mission.

card.name: Planned Assault
card.property: To play this event, choose an assigned team character who has a glyph. Gain 1 power for each glyph that character has.

card.name: Possible Fate
card.property: Look at the top five cards of any player's deck. Place them in any order on the top and/or bottom of that deck.

card.name: Research and Development
card.property: Stop up to two characters who each have 2 Science or more. For each character you stop, you may search your deck for a gear card, reveal it, and take it into hand. Then shuffle your deck.

card.name: Resilience
card.property: For each failed mission, each Russian team character gets skills +1 until the end of the current mission.

card.name: Self Sacrifice
card.property: Make an assigned support character skills +1 until the end of the current mission. At the end of that mission, destroy them.

card.name: Stoicism
card.property: Ready a character who has a glyph, and each other Russian character who has a glyph matching one that character has.

card.name: Strange Bedfellows
card.property: To play this event, choose two glyphs on two different characters. Move each of those glyphs to the other character.

card.name: Teamwork
card.property: This event costs power -1 to play for each assigned SGC character. Choose a team character to get skills +2 until the end of the current mission.

card.name: Tok'ra Ambush
card.property: Ready a Tok'ra support character.

card.name: Turn the Tables
card.property: Stop a ready adversary.

card.name: Victory or Death
card.property: To play this event, destroy an assigned Jaffa support character. Destroy an assigned adversary.

card.name: Canopic Jar
card.property: Stop an assigned adversary - Place this gear on them. You can do this only if this gear isn't already on an adversary. While this gear is on an adversary, they are blocked. When you fail a mission, destroy this gear.

card.name: G.D.O.
card.property: Stop this gear, pay 3 power - Unblock a character. Stop and destroy this gear, pay 3 power - Return an obstacle to its owner's hand.

card.name: Glider Cannon
card.property: Stop this gear, pay 2 power, stop a team character or Jaffa support character - Discard the top card of your deck. If it's a hero card, destroy an adversary.

card.name: Goa'uld Experiments
card.property: Stop this gear, destroy a support character - Each NID team character who has a glyph gets skills +1 until the end of the current mission.

card.name: ID Scanner
card.property: Each time you play a support character, you may stop this gear. If you do, stop that character and gain 1 power.

card.name: M9 Pistol
card.property: Stop this gear, block a team character from the current mission - Complications cost power +1 to play until the end of the current mission.

card.name: Ma'chello's Notes
card.property: Stop this gear - If the current mission is a Science mission, it gets difficulty -1. Pay 4 power, destroy this gear - Return an assigned adversary to their owner's hand.

card.name: Mimic device
card.property: You may boost a team character using a character card that has the same title as any of your other team characters.

card.name: Reole Chemical
card.property: Stop this gear - If the current mission is a Culture mission, it gets difficulty -1. Pay 3 power, destroy this gear - Return an obstacle to its owner's hand.

card.name: Repository of Knowledge
card.property: Stop this gear, block a character from the current mission: That character gets skills +3 until the end of the turn. At the start of your debrief phase, incapacitate them.

card.name: Sagan Institute Box
card.property: You get 1 experience while at least one support character has a glyph. Destroy this gear - Take a support character card from your discard pile into hand.

card.name: SGC Emblem
card.property: Your SGC characters get skills +1 for each successful mission this turn.

card.name: Smoke Grenades
card.property: Stop this gear - If the current mission is a Ingenuity mission, it gets difficulty -1. Destroy this gear - Return a complication to its owner's hand.

card.name: Sodan Cloaking Device
card.property: Stop this gear - If the current mission is a Combat mission, it gets difficulty -1. Destroy this gear - Return a support character to their owner's hand.

card.name: Tok'ra Operative Network
card.property: Obstacles cost power -1 to play. Stop this gear and a Tok'ra support character - Turn an obstacle at the current mission face down (it becomes a complication).

card.name: Tollan Health Monitor
card.property: Stop this gear, pay 2 power - Stop an incapacitated character (he is no longer incapacitated).

card.name: Touchstone
card.property: At the start of your debrief phase, you may look at a number of cards from the top of your deck equal to the amount of power you have remaining. Place them in any order on the top and/or bottom of that deck.

card.name: Walkie-Talkie
card.property: Stop this gear and choose a character - Choose another character who shares a trait with the stopped character (other than "character," "team," or "support"). The chosen character gets skills +1 until the end of the current mission.

card.name: Activate Trap
card.property: Success: Until the end of the turn, adversaries are blocked.

card.name: Avert Bombing
card.property: When you play this mission, you may pay 3 power. If you do, ready a character.

card.name: Build Naquadah Reactor
card.property: Success: Gain 2 power.

card.name: Canvass Illegal Operations
card.property: Success: You may take an event card from your discard pile into hand.

card.name: Catalog Alien Technology
card.property: Success: You may discard any number of cards, then refill your hand.

card.name: Construct Anti-Replicator Weapon
card.property: Failure: Your opponent may take an obstacle card from their discard pile into hand.

card.name: Contact Giant Aliens
card.property: Success: You may destroy an assigned support character. If you do, gain power equal to their cost.

card.name: Defeat Kull Warrior
card.property: When you play this mission, you may pay 4 power. If you do, it becomes an Ingenuity mission until the end of the turn.

card.name: Defeat Replicators
card.property: When you play this mission, you may pay 4 power. If you do, it becomes a Combat mission until the end of the turn.

card.name: Defend the Byrsa
card.property: Each time you boost a character, he gets an additional skills +1.

card.name: Destroy Ori Beachhead
card.property: Failure: Your opponent may play an adversary at no cost.

card.name: Disable the Link
card.property: When you play this mission, you may pay 4 power. If you do, it becomes a Science mission until the end of the turn.

card.name: Elude Patrols
card.property: The villain player performs the first action at this mission.

card.name: Entrap Goa'uld
card.property: Each time your opponent assigns an adversary, plays an obstacle, or plays a complication, you discard a random card.

card.name: Escape Bounty Hunter
card.property: This mission gets difficulty -1 for each failed mission.

card.name: Escape Naquadah Mine
card.property: When you play this mission, you may ready a character. If you do, that character is blocked.

card.name: Escape Prison World
card.property: Combat obstacles get difficulty +1.

card.name: Excavate Ancient Artifacts
card.property: Success: You may search your deck for an Ancient card. If you do, reveal it, take it into hand, and shuffle your deck.

card.name: Explore Anubis' Hybrid Lab
card.property: Failure: Your opponent may search their deck for an adversary card. If they do, they reveal it, takes it into hand, and shuffles their deck.

card.name: Expose Fraud
card.property: Failure: Your opponent destroys a support character and gains power equal to their cost.

card.name: Free Captives
card.property: Failure: Destroy all assigned support characters.

card.name: Gather Intelligence
card.property: Success: You may search your deck for an event cart. If you do, reveal it, take it into hand, and shuffle your deck.

card.name: Hold Off Ambush
card.property: When you play this mission, your opponent gains 2 power.

card.name: Hunt Goa'uld
card.property: Success: Choose a card in your opponent's villain score pile. They discard it.

card.name: Inform New President
card.property: This mission gets difficulty -1 for each obstacle at the current mission.

card.name: Intercept Osiris
card.property: Failure: Assigned adversaries get revive cost -2.

card.name: Invasion Reconnaissance
card.property: Success: Obstacles cost power +1 until the end of the turn.

card.name: Investigate Ancient Inscriptions
card.property: When you play this mission, choose a team character to get skills +2 until the end of the turn. At the start of your debrief phase, incapacitate them.

card.name: Investigate Dead Hosts
card.property: When a character earns a glyph from this mission, incapacitate them.

card.name: Investigate Mass Murder
card.property: When you play this mission, destroy a support character.

card.name: Liberate Servants of Baal
card.property: Success: Stop an adversary.

card.name: Persuade Oma Desala
card.property: Success: Destroy an adversary.

card.name: Prevent Annihilation
card.property: When you play this mission, you may pay 4 power. If you do, it becomes a Culture mission until the end of the turn.

card.name: Prevent Theft
card.property: Complications get difficulty +1.

card.name: Protected Planet Negotiations
card.property: Each time a player passes, they gain 1 power.

card.name: Reach Out to the Asgard
card.property: Success: Each team character who has a glyph gets skills +1 until the end of the turn.

card.name: Recover Z.P.M.
card.property: Support characters are blocked.

card.name: Repair the Sentinel
card.property: Each assigned character who has 3 Ingenuity or more gets Science +1.

card.name: Rescue Captive
card.property: When you play this mission, stop a character.

card.name: Rescue Team
card.property: Each support character who has 1 Culture or more gets Combat +1.

card.name: Restore Odin's Light
card.property: To assign a character, stop another character.

card.name: Restore Symbiotic Balance
card.property: Failure: Until the end of the turn, playing a mission costs power +1.

card.name: Reveal Coercion
card.property: Obstacles cost power -1 to play.

card.name: Sabotage Goa'uld Alliance
card.property: Each time your opponent assigns an adversary or plays an obstacle, you lose 1 power.

card.name: Stop Experiments
card.property: Science obstacles cost power -1 to play.

card.name: Stop Prim'tah
card.property: While an adversary is assigned, to assign a character, you must pay power +1.

card.name: Sway Villagers
card.property: This mission gets difficulty +2 for each adversary card in your opponent's villain score pile.

card.name: Translate Cartouche
card.property: This mission gets difficulty +1 for each assigned character who doesn't have a glyph.

card.name: Advancing Line
card.property: Failure: Stop a team character. If a Jaffa adversary is assigned, incapacitate a team character instead.

card.name: Alien Foothold
card.property: When you play this obstacle, stop a support character.

card.name: Alliance of System Lords
card.property: To play this obstacle, stop an adversary unless no characters are assigned. Gain 2 power.

card.name: Ancient Contagion
card.property: Failure: Choose one: destroy a support character; or incapacitate a team character.

card.name: Approaching Swarm
card.property: This obstacle counts as two Replicator cards.

card.name: Backstabbed
card.property: Dominion. (When you score an adversary, you may also score one obstacle with dominion.) When you play this obstacle, if a Jaffa adversary is assigned, choose a support character. They are blocked.

card.name: Battle Losses
card.property: Failure: Your opponent destroys a support character.

card.name: Blackmailed
card.property: Failure: Destroy a support character whose cost is qual to or less than the total number of political cards.

card.name: Blocked Escape
card.property: When you play this obstacle, choose a character for each other Replicator card at the current mission. Those characters are blocked.

card.name: Booby-Trapped Z.P.M.
card.property: Dominion. (When you score an adversary, you may also score one obstacle with dominion.) Failure: If a Goa'uld adversary is assigned, destroy a gear.

card.name: Building the Ranks
card.property: When you play this obstacle, gain 1 power for each other Replicator card at the current mission.

card.name: Buried Gate
card.property: To assign a character, your opponent pays 1 power.

card.name: Caught Off Guard
card.property: When you play this obstacle, destroy a gear.

card.name: Cave-In
card.property: When you play this obstacle, your opponent loses 2 power.

card.name: Containment Field
card.property: This obstacle costs power +1 to play for each assigned character. When you play this obstacle, ready all assigned characters. They are blocked.

card.name: Critical Wound
card.property: When you play this obstacle, incapacitate a team character.

card.name: Cut Off
card.property: When you play this obstacle, you may return a support character to his owner's hand.

card.name: Deep Memory Scan
card.property: Failure: Stop a team character.

card.name: Dimensional Shift
card.property: When you play this obstacle, choose a character. They are blocked, along with each other character who has a glyph matching one of theirs.

card.name: Enduring Evil
card.property: When you play this obstacle, take an adversary card from your villain score pile into hand.

card.name: Energy Feedback
card.property: Failure: Choose one: Destroy a gear; or stop a character.

card.name: Entranced
card.property: Dominion. (When you score an adversary, you may also score one obstacle with dominion.) Failure: If a Goa'uld adversary is assigned, you may move a glyph from one team character to another.

card.name: Epidemic
card.property: This obstacle gets difficulty +1 for each other Disease obstacle. Failure: You may take this obstacle into your hand.

card.name: Estrangement
card.property: Failure: Return a support character to their owner's hand.

card.name: False Memory
card.property: Failure: Look at the top card of your opponent's mission pile. Place it on the top or bottom of that pile.

card.name: Fearing a Return
card.property: Dominion. (When you score an adversary, you may also score one obstacle with dominion.) Failure: You may take a Goa'uld obstacle card from your discard pile into hand.

card.name: Forced to Surrender
card.property: Failure: Incapacitate a team character. Unless a Goa'uld adversary is assigned, your opponent may prevent this by stopping a ready team character instead.

card.name: Framed for Murder
card.property: Failure: Destroy a support character and stop a team character.

card.name: Full Contingent
card.property: This obstacle costs power -1 to play for each other Jaffa obstacle and for each assigned Jaffa adversary.

card.name: Galactic Threat
card.property: This obstacle costs power +1 to play for each assigned character.

card.name: Glider Strafing Run
card.property: Failure: Destroy a support character (or two support characters, if a Jaffa adversary is assigned).

card.name: Hazardous Duty
card.property: When you play this obstacle, chose an assigned character. Success: If the chosen character earns the current mission's glyph, incapacitate him.

card.name: Head Injury
card.property: When you play this obstacle, choose an assigned character. Your opponent may stop him. Success or Failure: If the chosen character is assigned, incapacitate them.

card.name: Horus Guard
card.property: Dominion. (When you score an adversary, you may also score one obstacle with dominion.) Failure: If a Jaffa adversary is assigned, stop a character.

card.name: In-Fighting
card.property: When you play this obstacle, you may move a glyph from one team character to another.

card.name: Joint Mission
card.property: When you play this obstacle, choose a ready team character who isn't blocked. Success or Failure: If the chosen character isn't assigned, incapacitate them.

card.name: Judgment of the Taldur
card.property: Failure: Your opponent can't play any more missions this turn.

card.name: Kneel Before Your God
card.property: When you play this obstacle, if a Goa'uld or Jaffa adversary is assigned, you gain 2 power. When you play this obstacle, if a Jaffa character is assigned, your opponent gains 2 power.

card.name: Kor Mak Joining
card.property: Failure: You may move a glyph from one team character to another. If you do, stop both of those characters.

card.name: Living Bomb
card.property: Failure: Destroy a gear and/or a support government.

card.name: Loyal Subjects
card.property: To play this obstacle, discard either: two cards; or one obstacle that has dominion. Gain 1 power.

card.name: Memory Stamp
card.property: When you play this obstacle, you may move a glyph from one team character to another.

card.name: Mind Invasion
card.property: Failure: For each other Replicator card at the current mission, incapacitate a team character.

card.name: Near-Death Experience
card.property: Failure: You may choose to have your opponent shuffle their mission pile.

card.name: New Guy!
card.property: When you play this obstacle, choose a team character. For each glyph they have, each team character who has no glyph gets skills -1.

card.name: Nish'ta
card.property: When you play this obstacle, choose a team character who has no glyph. They are blocked.

card.name: Not What He Appears
card.property: Dominion. (When you score an adversary, you may also score one obstacle with dominion.) This obstacle costs power -1 to play while a Goa'uld adversary is assigned.

card.name: Occupation Force
card.property: While a Jaffa adversary is assigned, this obstacle gets dominion. (When you score an adversary, you may also score one obstacle with dominion.)

card.name: On Alert
card.property: This obstacle gets difficulty +1 for each failed mission this turn.

card.name: Paperwork
card.property: Failure: Stop all characters.

card.name: Payoff
card.property: Failure: Place this obstacle on a character. They get: "Each time your opponent plays a Political obstacle, you may pay 1 power. If you don't, stop this character." When your opponent succeeds at a mission, destroy this obstacle.

card.name: Plea for Help
card.property: When you play this obstacle, look at the bottom card of your opponent's mission pile, then place it on the top or bottom of that pile.

card.name: Prisoners of the Jaffa
card.property: Dominion. (When you score an adversary, you may also score one obstacle with dominion.) Failure: If a Jaffa adversary is assigned, destroy a stopped support or assigned support character.

card.name: Programmed
card.property: Failure: Return a support character to their owner's hand.

card.name: Questioned Loyalties
card.property: When you play this obstacle, choose a ready support character. Success or Failure: If the chosen character is assigned, destroy them.

card.name: Rapid Aging
card.property: Failure: Incapacitate an assigned team character and destroy all assigned support characters.

card.name: Rebuffed
card.property: When you play this obstacle, ready an assigned character. They are blocked.

card.name: Recognized
card.property: Dominion. (When you score an adversary, you may also score one obstacle with dominion.) While a Goa'uld adversary is assigned, this obstacle gets difficulty +1 for each assigned character who has a glyph.

card.name: Revolutionaries
card.property: Failure: Destroy a support character. If another Political card is at the current mission, you may incapacitate a team character instead.

card.name: Ribbon Device Torture
card.property: Failure: Your opponent discards two random cards. If a Goa'uld adversary is assigned, you may instead look at your opponent's hand. If you do, choose a card from it for them to discard.

card.name: Rigged Explosives
card.property: When you play this obstacle, your opponent destroys a support character.

card.name: Risk of Exposure
card.property: When you play this obstacle, gain 1 power for each glyph on each assigned character.

card.name: Scenarios of the Keeper
card.property: Failure: Look at the top five cards of your opponent's deck. You may place them in any order on the top and/or bottom of that deck.

card.name: Security Field
card.property: This obstacle costs power +1 to play for each assigned character.

card.name: Spreading Fear
card.property: Dominion. (When you score an adversary, you may also score one obstacle with dominion.) This obstacle costs power -1 to play while a Jaffa adversary is assigned.

card.name: Standoff
card.property: When you play this obstacle, gain 1 power for each glyph on each assigned character.

card.name: Strained Relations
card.property: Failure: Gain 2 power.

card.name: Sudden Onset
card.property: When you play this obstacle, you may take a Disease obstacle card from your discard pile into hand.

card.name: Suicidal Za'tarc
card.property: When you play this obstacle, choose a ready support character. Success or Failure: If the chosen character is assigned, destroy them.

card.name: Taken in Secret
card.property: Failure: Destroy a support character. If a Goa'uld adversary is assigned, destroy another support character.

card.name: Targeted Abduction
card.property: When you play this obstacle, stop an assigned character whose skill being contributed to the current mission is equal to or less than the number of other Replicator cards there.

card.name: Terminal Condition
card.property: Failure: Destroy a support character.

card.name: Test of Worthiness
card.property: Failure: Stop all characters.

card.name: Time Dilation
card.property: Failure: Your opponent skips their next turn. (You will take your turn as the hero player twice in a row.)

card.name: Turncoat
card.property: Failure: Look at the top card of your opponent's mission pile. Place it on the top or bottom of that pile.

card.name: Unas Attack
card.property: When you play this obstacle, your opponent destroys a support character.

card.name: Unbelievers
card.property: Failure: Destroy any number of support characters whose total cost equals 5 or less.

card.name: Unfamiliar Customs
card.property: Each time your opponent plays a support character, that character is blocked until the end of the current mission.

card.name: Unforeseen Consequences
card.property: Failure: Gain 2 power.

card.name: Anubis
card.property: While this adversary card is in your villain score pile, your Goa'uld and Jaffa adversaries get difficulty +1 and revive cost +2.

card.name: Apophis
card.property: At the end of your opponent's power phase, if this adversary card is in your villain score pile, you gain 1 power.

card.name: Baal
card.property: Each time you revive Baal, you may pay 4 power. If you do, score him (even if the mission was a success).

card.name: Brainwashed Teal'c
card.property: While Brainwashed Teal'c is assigned, complications cost power -1 to play. When you score Brainwashed Teal'c, stop all SGC team and Jaffa team characters.

card.name: Hathor
card.property: Each time you revive Hathor, place the top card of your deck face down beneath her. When you score Hathor, for each card beneath her, destroy a gear or support character.

card.name: Replicator Carter
card.property: While Replicator Carter is assigned, you may play any Replicator obstacle at no cost if another obstacle with the same title is already at the current mission.
